This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r echo=FALSE}
setwd("C:/Users/alexherseg/Downloads/tilegridmaps/")
states <- read.csv("states.csv")

library(RColorBrewer)
palette <- brewer.pal(9, "PuRd")[5:9] # [c(0:4*2+1)]

x <- "nyt_x"
y <- "nyt_y"
par(mar = c(0,0,0,0))
plot(0, 0, type="n", xlab="", ylab="", xlim=c(-0.6,13), ylim=c(-0.5,8), asp=1, bty="n", axes=FALSE)
symbols(x = states[, x], y = states[, y], circles = rep(0.5, 51), fg = "white", lwd = 1.5, bg = sample(palette, size = 51, replace = T), inches = F, add = T)
text(states[, x],states[, y], states$STUSPS, col = "white", cex = 0.8)

```
